about_the_game:
Kobi the Scottie dog moves into a new house with his human. Apparently, he is not really impressed with this fact. And, if that wasn't enough, he sees a strange shaggy creature in his own kitchen. The uninvited guest vanished into thin air before his eyes! What a mess! But who was that? And, more importantly, how to get rid of it?

After all this mayhem, Kobi gets into a series of incredible events and discovers that he is in a completely incomprehensible place - Moon Valley.  What awaits him in this new unknown world? And, most importantly, how to get home for dinner?

With your help Kobi is rushing home - he don't belong in this strange magic world, his Human is waiting for him, (completely helpless without his faithful canine friend), and, besides, it'll be a mealtime soon! So he needs a help of mysterious Moon Mother, the patron of the Valley who hasn't been seen in years…

Immerse yourself in a cute and cozy summertime story, full of whimsical characters and unexpected turns! Classic point-and-click adventure game, made with frame-by-frame animation, sprinkled with charming music, hand painted watercolor backgrounds and with the full respect to the old classic adventure games mechanics.

Play as a very cute dog, discover mysteries of the house and find a hidden world, full of quirky places and whimsical creatures. Search every corner of the house and the yard, find all of the mysterious creatures living (or not) here and there. Help them to solve the Mysterious Disappearance of Precious Trophy and the other strange cases.

Featured:

  • Canine protagonist

  • Cute pig friend

  • More than 40 scenes, hand painted with watercolors

  • Charming hidden world just behind the corner

  • Quirky characters with their own background stories and quests

  • Light-hearted summertime story

  • Amazing music

  • Nice puzzles

  • Classic frame-by-frame animation

  • Cozy, text reach story

  • THE GHOST SQUIRREL!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 (64 Bit only)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Single Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Working one required
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Working one recommended
  • Additional Notes: Disk space requirements could differ in the final version of the game
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 (64 Bit only)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Single Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Disk space requirements could differ in the final version of the game

short_description: Help Kobi the Dog to solve the secrets of his new house, find the Empress and return to his beloved Master with the help of mysterious Moon Mother. Immerse yourself in this whimsical adventure game with hand-painted backgrounds, quirky characters, light-hearted story and amazing music!
